name: Stoutland

passive.name: Sniff Out
passive.effect: Once per turn, flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokemon or Trainer and put it into your hand. If tails, search your deck for an Energy and put it into your hand. Either way, shuffle your deck afterwards.

flavor: These Pokemon take quite a bit of training to reach their final form. They have contests where the biggest fans of them fly in and show off their bond.
